channel.title: Need help choosing a good Dedi, I can't find one
channel.description:
Hi, I'm the owner of a server which has around 200 players online most of the time, which causes a ton of lag on the current VPS I'm using, and my donations have just come in and it's time for me to get a new VPS, but there aren't really any good VPS's that meet my needs so I'm looking for a Dedi. Of course a VPS would work.
My current VPS lags and it has 4GB ram, and tbh I have no idea what the other specs are.
Anyways I'm looking for a good hosting company that I can get a dedi or VPS from for anything less than 300$ a month, because I'd rather not spend over 300$ a month on it.
Thanks for whoever can help, because I'm about to blow my brains out because I can't find a damn VPS or Dedi and I've been looking for hours..
Please don't send me a link off google if you're going to try and help, actually send me a link to a good pre-made one good for a server
Thanksssss

item.title: Need help choosing a good Dedi, I can't find one
item.dc:creator: @fpkers fpkers
item.description:
@fpkers wrote:

Wow, thanks
That’s actually what I’m looking for.
I’ll see if that will work

Edit: They were out of stock on EVERYTHING

Read full topic

Something that i have noticed is if you change your Run.bat file
from like 500M to like 812M
It helps with Stability.
